name: A Good Night's Sleep
description:
Gus lives in a really inconvenient apartment and needs your help to get a good night's sleep.

3 of the 10 ceiling pipes are emitting 3 different levels of sound and are keeping Gus from sleeping. With 3 assorted corks in hand, you'll need to find the correct combination by plugging them into the right pipes.

This game jam was made for DATGAM-X.

Xbox 360 controller recommended

Keyboard Controls
[Left, Right] Change pipe selection
[A] Switch cork left
[S] Switch cork right
[Z] Select cork
[X] Remove cork
[Enter] Begin/confirm/continue
[Esc] Quit to Menu

Credits (2014)
Boum - Art
technobeanie - Game Design, Programming
